meanings.definition: Items designed to be thrown away after use.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to have enough disposables for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of disposables like paper plates and plastic utensils.
meanings.sent3: When the party ended, the disposables felt relieved to fulfill their purpose.
meanings.sent4: The disposables piled up in the trash, a mountain of convenience.
meanings.sent5: The disposables cluttered the table, a colorful array of single-use items.

meanings.sent1: The company switched to using more eco-friendly disposables.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pack of disposables for her upcoming camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The disposables whispered to each other, excited to be used and discarded.
meanings.sent4: His trust in people was like disposables, easily thrown away.
meanings.sent5: The disposables littered the beach, a sad sight of convenience gone wrong.
